mapper.select: SELECT a.id id, a.serialsnumber serialsnumber, b.name contracttype, a.startdate startdate, a.enddate enddate, c.suppliername vendiorname FROM wm_contractbasic a, wm_dictionaryschild b, wm_supplier c WHERE a.spcode = '99' AND a.flag = 'E' AND a.contracttype = b.id AND b.flag = 'E' AND a.venditorid = c.id AND c.flag = 'E' AND a.contractstatus = '执行' ORDER BY backtime DESC
